name: cloudkeeper
description:
A tiny, relaxing little game made for Mini Jam 34: Balance. You are a little cloud drifting above a garden. Keep the balance of nature by watering the flowers to help them grow and fading out now and then to give them sunlight. Oh - and don't rain on the bees, they don't like that.

Space to water the plants, X to fade out.

Music from https://filmmusic.io/
"Continue Life" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
